Package br.com.caelum.vraptor.vraptor2

Interface Summary
ComponentInfoProvider Provides information related to vraptor 2 for the request.
Config VRaptor2 config file representation.
 

Class Summary
AjaxInterceptor VRaptor2 based ajax interceptor.
Only outjects data if its not a viewless method.
BeanHelper Vraptor 2 bean dealing helper methods.
ComponentRoutesParser A vraptor 2 and 3 compatible routes creator.
ConverterWrapper Wraps a vraptor2 converter in a vraptor3 converter.
DefaultComponentInfoProvider  
HibernateValidatorPluginInterceptor Support to vraptor2 hibernate validator plugin.
Limited support to parameters only.
Info VRaptor 2 util methods.
LogicAnnotationWithParanamerParameterNameProvider Looks up for the Logic annotation on the method, if its found and containing the parameters value, its value is used.
MessageCreatorValidator The vraptor2 compatible messages creator.
Provider Customized provider with support for both vraptor 2 and 3 components.
ValidationErrorsFactory  
ValidatorInterceptor Interceptor which invokes vraptor2-like validation methods.
ViewInterceptor The vraptor 2 compatible view interceptor.
ViewsPropertiesPageResult An implementation of page result which also reads views.properties entries
VRaptor2ComponentHandler  
VRaptor2Config Loads some basic config from vraptor.xml.
Only this basic configuration is automatically supported.
VRaptor2Converters An adaptor between vraptor2 converter list and vraptor 3.
If you use the default converters delegate, it requires the register container in order to register new converters.
VRaptor2PathResolver Vraptor 2 and 3 compatible path resolver.
VRaptor2RequestExecution A vraptor 2 request execution process.
 

Exception Summary
ConfigException  
ExpressionEvaluationException
